tool_description: Assesses the impact of inventory levels and availability on fulfillment performance, identifying stockout effects and inventory optimization opportunities.

assessment_scope.description: Scope of assessment: all_products, fast_movers, slow_movers, seasonal_items

error_messages: Invalid assessment scope: Use one of [all_products, fast_movers, slow_movers, seasonal_items]
Invalid inventory thresholds: Thresholds must be positive integers in ascending order
Inventory data unavailable: Cannot access current inventory levels for assessment
usage: Specify assessment_scope and optionally set inventory_thresholds to analyze the relationship between stock levels and fulfillment performance.

stockout_impact.description: Analysis of how stockouts affect fulfillment metrics

optimal_levels.description: Recommended inventory levels for optimal fulfillment

cost_implications.description: Cost implications of inventory decisions on fulfillment
